_INSTRUCTIONS: This is a FLEXIBLE character template. You can have 1-3 Rainbow themes and 0-2 Realness themes. Delete unused themes below!
_THEME_OPTIONS: Keep only the number of themes you want. Empty slots will automatically hide in the Player App.
_NEW_FEATURE: You can now have UP TO 2 REALNESS THEMES! Perfect for complex identities and dual natures.

rainbowThemes._COMMENT: Rainbow Theme 2 - OPTIONAL (Fighting Style/Q-Gear) - DELETE THIS ENTIRE BLOCK IF NOT USING
Rainbow Theme 3 - OPTIONAL (Q-Gear/Personality) - DELETE THIS ENTIRE BLOCK IF NOT USING

realnessThemes._COMMENT: Realness Theme 1 - OPTIONAL - DELETE THIS ENTIRE BLOCK IF NOT USING
Realness Theme 2 - NEW! OPTIONAL - For complex identities, dual natures, public/private selves - DELETE THIS ENTIRE BLOCK IF NOT USING
